name: my-controllers
description: my-controllers is a versatile Node.js package designed to streamline controller management in Express.js applications. It simplifies the integration of MongoDB through Mongoose, providing utility functions for CRUD operations and model creation. This package includes pre-built controller functions for handling common API tasks, such as creating and retrieving data, while also offering a straightforward approach to establishing MongoDB connections. Ideal for developers looking to enhance their backend infrastructure, my-controllers helps you efficiently manage your data and API endpoints with minimal setup.
author: Bhaskar Antony
